metadata.name: Welcome To My World
metadata.description:
Hi 

I find that sometimes DMs can be intrusive, and more than wanting to sell something, I wanted to introduce new people to my work and give you a glimpse into my world.

My music is focused on personal connections and emotion which I believe are more important than ever for an artist's journey. 

This week to close off my first period of experimentation I will be releasing the Real Friends video as my first 1/1 which I hope will stand out amongst what is out there already.

The auction starting price will be 0 on Glass Protocol... come say hi 

If you would like to learn more about me and what inspires me head to my mirror page: https://mirror.xyz/sofractures.eth

Thanks for your time

Jamie x
